snippet: A man arrested last year during antigovernment demonstrations died in state custody, apparently in a suicide that his family said Friday was the result of harsh prison conditions and unjust punishment.
abstract: Venezuelan man Rodolfo Gonzalez dies of apparent suicide while in prison, where he had been held for nearly a year since his arrest during antigovernment demonstrations.
lead_paragraph: A man arrested last year during antigovernment demonstrations died in state custody, apparently in a suicide that his family said Friday was the result of harsh prison conditions and unjust punishment.

headline.main: Venezuela: Inmate Dies in State Custody
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Venezuela: Inmate Dies in State Custody
